column5: I'm leaving in about two weeks thru fort francis, is there still leeches availible in town somewhere? And do they usually run out about this time(august 1st). I can't wait, this will be the first trip with one of my boys to canada.

We usually stop and buy leeches at the Can-Op right before the bridge that crosses over Rainy Lake. They have sometimes been good and sometimes not so good... otherwise, I think there is a bait shop in Dryden (after the mill, by a stoplight) that sells leeches by the lb. Scott
